channel.title: Jump
channel.description:
When pressing spacebar for jump it jumps 2 steps backwards on Inbound tram.
tried it with MS wireless keyboard, Logitech G13, still the same
Win 7 64bit
setpos 315.939575 -6145.452148 187.031250;setang 16.625267 163.123260 0.000000

item.title: Jump
item.dc:creator: Zuul
item.description:
OCDMonkey:

Really? Since 1998? That’s impressive since the first source game was released in 2004.

Sarcasm aside, I don’t think that is a bug. I mean, true, it wouldn’t work that way in real life, but that “bug” was in the original Half-Life as well (the steam version at least. Bought the WON version this past week and am hoping for it to arrive soon), and I doubt it would be easily fixed (although, I’m not a modder, so I really don’t know).

hehe yeah let’s nitpick. Now, is there a way to post videofiles in here, cause I recorded a few seconds and converted to xvid…4.5mb?

Read full topic

item.title: Jump
item.dc:creator: OCDMonkey
item.description:
Zuul:

yeah…You know I’ve been playing source games since 1998 and this never happened. I’ll try to take a short video of it. edit later.

Really? Since 1998? That’s impressive since the first source game was released in 2004.

Sarcasm aside, I don’t think that is a bug. I mean, true, it wouldn’t work that way in real life, but that “bug” was in the original Half-Life as well (the steam version at least. Bought the WON version this past week and am hoping for it to arrive soon), and I doubt it would be easily fixed (although, I’m not a modder, so I really don’t know).

item.title: Jump
item.dc:creator: Zuul
item.description:
CptKlink:

Really you have to be kidding me thats not a bug your moving forward at a fair speed and you jump straight up what do you think is going to happen you will move backwards till you land common sense and basic physics should of told you that

yeah…You know I’ve been playing source games since 1998 and this never happened. I’ll try to take a short video of it. edit later.

Read full topic
